item.title: CBC Interviews & Secret Recordings [Leadership Now Podcast]
item.description:
In this episode of Leadership Now with Dr. Aaron Rock, Aaron and Chris discuss a news article/podcast that was released by the CBC (Canadian Broadcasting Corporation) which featured interviews from Aaron on his stance on lockdowns, sphere sovereignty, and LGBTQ.

 

More Resources:

Link to CBC article/podcast here: https://www.cbc.ca/news/politics/fundamentalist-christian-movement-1.6793677

 

We are excited to partner with the Fight Laugh Feast Network to reach more listeners. Download the app here: https://subsplash.com/fightlaughfeastnetwork/app

 

More resources at Dr. Aaron Rock’s blog: Pursuit of Glory https://pursuitofglory.org/
item.author: Aaron Rock, Chris Eelman
item.itunes:author: Aaron Rock, Chris Eelman

item.title: The Deadly Sin of Pride (Month) [Leadership Now Podcast]
item.description:
June is upon us, which means it's time for another year of "pride month". In this episode, Aaron aptly speaks about the deadly sin of pride, how it coincides with the LGBTQ+ movement, ways in which it can sneakily take root in our lives, and how we as Christians can overcome the sin of pride through the finished work of Jesus Christ.

More Resources:

We are excited to partner with the Fight Laugh Feast Network to reach more listeners. Download the app here: https://subsplash.com/fightlaughfeastnetwork/app

 

More resources at Dr. Aaron Rock’s blog: Pursuit of Glory https://pursuitofglory.org/
